b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: An 18 year old girl from Helsinki, Finland. Inspired by fashion, art, people and music. Expressing myself through fashion, outfits and daily lifestyle. You can also follow me on Instagram with the name @katarinalilius for more everyday photos. Hope you enjoy!
